document_data.mainbody:
tokely Silverstream was the leader of the dwarven Clan Battlehammer that dwelt in Kelvins Cairn in Icewind Dale.
In his position as leader of the Clan Battlehammer dwarves, Stokely sometimes met with various humans, including Darby Snide, at a tavern in Bremen.
Stokely was apparently killed in 1484 DR by Tiago Baenre during the Battle of Kelvins Cairn when Tiagos forces attacked Clan Battlehammer. in truth he remained prisoner of the House Xorlarrin until 1485 DR when was freed after the dwarven victory in the War of the Silver Marches.
